title: Leave buster hate = hitting ppl IRL
body: so I been on leave buster for 4 weeks now only because I don't play since this 5 game ban I have had more then 5 games with no issues no leaving or bad player skills or anything like that  and still get the low priority list and I don't get how it has latest this long ?? ive spend a few hundred on this game and thing this ban has gone way tooo long more then 5 games makes me wanna smash ppl I see playing LoL

replies.body: Mines the worst, i have too wait 20 frikken minutes in a low prority queue all because i dc'd from a match when it said i left the match or went afk... fix this Riot
Thats nothing dude, My leaveBuster timer keeps resetting so i dont even get the chance to play.
